name: Gundren Rockseeker

appearance.description: A hardy dwarf with a thick brown beard streaked with gray. Wears practical traveling clothes and a wide-brimmed hat. Carries himself with the confidence of someone who's spent years in the wilderness.

traits: Optimistic and enthusiastic about his discovery
Generous with friends, shrewd in business
personality.voice: Gruff but warm. Heavy dwarven accent. Laughs easily.
mannerisms: Taps his pipe against his boot

background.history: The Rockseeker brothers have been searching for the legendary Wave Echo Cave for years. Recently found a map!

relationships.sildar_hallwinter: Hired bodyguard and friend from Neverwinter
relationships.party: Hired them to escort supplies, doesn't know them well yet
relationships.brothers: Very close. They're waiting in Phandalin.

current_status: Captured by goblins after ambush on Triboar Trail. Being held at Cragmaw Castle.
secrets: Found a map to Wave Echo Cave
The map is hidden in his pack
Knows the cave contains the Forge of Spells
His brothers are already in Phandalin setting up operations
sample_dialogue: Bah! Nothing a bit of dwarvish ale won't fix!
I tell ye, this discovery will make us all rich as kings!
Wave Echo Cave... it's real, lads. As real as the stone beneath our feet!
My brothers are good dwarves. Bit stuffy, but solid as granite.
Phandalin's a rough town, but it's got good bones. Good people too, mostly.
quest_hooks: If rescued, offers significant reward (25gp each + magic item)
Begs party to check on his brothers in Phandalin
Warns about the 'Black Spider' - someone else looking for the cave
